how_it_works: Add your design requests. We’ll ask questions, and work with you to establish a brief.
We work with you to prioritise tasks and briefs, picking the best one to start work on.
Once you’re happy with the brief, we’ll start work straight away.
We’ll revise the design until you’re 100% happy.

body.ux: Our designers also have technical experience, so designs "make sense" both technically and from a user's POV.
body.dev: Our developers have both UX and extensive development experience, so things "make sense" both technically and from a user's POV.

body.ux: All IP and assets are owned by you. They are unique and custom designed.
body.dev: All IP and assets are owned by you. They are unique and custom.
